definition: a small hole or loop (as in a needle), look at
details:
noun
- a small hole or loop (as in a needle)
= example: a small hole or loop (as in a needle)
- the organ of sight
= synonyms: optic
- good discernment, either visually or as if visually
= example: good discernment, either visually or as if visually
- attention to what is seen
= example: attention to what is seen
- an area that is approximately central within some larger region
= synonyms: middle
verb
- look at
= synonyms: eyeball
